alert.note: Alert for Hubbard; Mahnomen; South Clearwater; Wadena (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 01 at 6:29AM CST until March 01 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Total accumulations of 6 to 10 inches. Not all areas will receive the higher end amounts, and there will be large gradients across individual counties. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Mahnomen, South Clearwater, Hubbard and Wadena Counties. * WHEN...Until 3 PM CST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Travel may be difficult. Falling snow and blowing snow may significantly reduce the visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the Wednesday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest rates of snowfall will continue through this morning.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at travel.dot.nd.gov and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.
